name: Enforcement
text:
The department of health shall enforce this part.  Authorized employees of the department may issue warnings, citations, or administrative orders, or commence civil action in circuit court against persons who fail to comply with the requirements of this part. [L 2000, c 173, pt of §1]
 
         [Section effective July 1, 2015.  For section effective until June 30, 2015, see above.]  The department of health shall enforce this part.  Authorized employees of the department may issue warnings, citations, or administrative orders, or commence civil action in circuit environmental court against persons who fail to comply with the requirements of this part. [L 2000, c 173, pt of §1; am L 2014, c 218, §8]
